spiritsExplanation: The primary workout spirit for this video is 'Soothing & Restorative'. The title '40 Minute Guided Breathing Meditation for Deep Relaxation and Inner Stillness' directly emphasizes relaxation and stress reduction. The description outlines a focus on 'deep relaxation' and 'inner stillness', with guided breathing intended to help users overcome distractions and achieve a calm state. Additionally, the tags such as 'Relaxation', 'Soothing meditation', 'Stress-relief', 'Calm', and 'Gentle' reinforce the restorative nature of the content. Comments further corroborate this classification, with users expressing feelings of calmness, peace, and restoration after participating in the session. The channel's description also supports this focus, highlighting deep relaxation and breath work as core elements of the content. Given these factors, the video strongly embodies the principles of a 'Soothing & Restorative' workout spirit.
